result.eng: It seems that it will be easy.
result.ga: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca
result.orig: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca
result.html: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuma ar an scéal go mbeiḋ sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.

result.eng: It seems that not many jobs are available.
result.ga: Tá an chuma ar an scéal nach bhfuil mórán postanna le fáil
result.orig: Tá an chuma ar an scéal nach bhfuil mórán postanna le fáil
result.html: Tá an chuma ar an scéal nach bhfuil mórán postanna le fáilIt seems that not many jobs are available.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuma ar an scéal naċ ḃfuil mórán postanna le fáilIt seems that not many jobs are available.

result.ga: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.orig: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.html: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do ċuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.

result.eng: It seems she only had one duty.
result.ga: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.orig: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.html: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aċ dualgas aṁáin uirṫi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.
